Verses: 1 isravelennum Peyarpetru, Yoodhaavin Neerootrilirundhu Surandhavargalum, Karththarudaiya Naamaththinmel Aanaiyittu, Unmaiyum Needhiyum Illaamal Isravelin Dhevanai Arikkaiyidugiravargalumaana Yaakkobin Vamsaththaare, Kelungal.
2 avargal Thangalaip Parisuththa Nagaraththaar Endru Solli, Senaigalin Karththar Ennum Naamamulla Isravelin Dhevanmel Patrudhalaayirukkiraargal.
3 poorvakaalaththil Nadandhavaigalai Aadhimudhal Ariviththen, Avaigal En Vaayilirundhu Pirandhana, Avaigalai Velippaduththinen; Avaigalai Sadidhiyaai Seydhen, Avaigal Nadandhana.
4 nee Kadinamullavanendrum, Un Pidari Narambu Irumbendrum, Un Netri Vengalamendrum Arindhirukkiren.

5 aagaiyaal: En Vikkiragam Avaigalai Seydhadhendrum, Naan Seydha Suroobamum, Naan Vaarppiththa Vikkiragamum Avaigalaik Kattalaiyittadhendrum Nee Sollaadhapadikku, Naan Avaigalai Munname Unakku Ariviththu, Avaigal Varaadhadharkumunne Unakku Velippaduththinen.

6 avaigalaik Kelvippattaaye, Avaigalaiyellaam Paar, Ippozhudhu Neengalum Avaigalai Arivikkalaamallavo? Idhumudhal Pudhiyavaigalaanavaigalaiyum, Nee Ariyaadha Maraiporulaanavaigalaiyum Unakkuth Therivikkiren.
7 avaigal Aadhimudharkondu Alla, Ippozhudhe Undaakkappattana; Idho, Avaigalai Ariven Endru Nee Sollaadhapadikku, Innaatkalukku Munne Nee Avaigalaik Kelvippadavillai.
8 nee Kelvippadavumillai, Ariyavumillai; Aadhimudhal Un Sevi Thirandhirukkavumillai; Nee Dhrogampannuvaayenbadhaiyum, Thaayin Karppanthodangi Nee Meerugiravanendrum Peyarpetradhaiyum Arindhirukkiren.
9 en Naamaththinimiththam En Kobaththai Niruththivaiththen; Unnai Sangarikkaadhapadikku Naan En Pugazhchchiyinimiththam Unmel Porumaiyaayiruppen.
10 idho, Unnaip Pudamitten; Aanaalum Velliyaippolalla, Ubaththiravaththin Kugaiyile Unnaith Therindhukonden.
11 ennimiththam, Ennimiththame Appadi Seyven; En Naamaththin Parisuththam Eppadik Kulaikkappadalaam? En Magimaiyai Naan Veroruvarukkunkoden.
12 yaakkobe, Naan Azhaiththirukkira Isravele, Enakku Sevikodu; Naan Avare, Naan Mundhinavarum Naan Pindhinavarumaame.
13 en Karame Boomiyai Asthibaarappaduththi, En Valadhukai Vaanangalai Alavittadhu; Naan Avaigalukkuk Kattalaiyida, Avaigal Anaiththum Nirkum.
14 neengalellaarum Koodivandhu Kelungal; Karththarukkup Piriyamaanavan Avarukku Siththamaanadhai Baabilonil Seyvaan; Avan Buyam Kaldheyarinmel Irukkum Enbadhai Ivargalil Ariviththavan Yaar?
15 naan, Naane Adhai Sonnen; Naan Avanai Azhaiththen; Naan Avanai Varappanninen; Avan Vazhi Vaaikkum.

16 neengal En Sameebaththil Vandhu Naan Solvadhaik Kelungal; Naan Aadhimudharkondu Andharangaththil Pesavillai; Adhu Undaana Kaalanthuvakki Ange Naan Irundhen; Ippozhudho Karththaraagiya Aandavarum, Avarudaiya Aaviyum Ennai Anuppugiraar.

17 isravelin Parisuththaraayirukkira Un Meetparaana Karththar Sollugiradhaavadhu: Prayojanamaayirukkiradhai Unakkup Podhiththu, Nee Nadakkavendiya Vazhiyile Unnai Nadaththugira Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Naane.
